text: Ferenc Rákosi (, November 25, 1910 in Pancsova – July 10, 1987 in Budapest) was a Hungarian field handball player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Hungarian field handball team, which finished fourth in the Olympic tournament. He played four matches. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Hungary Category:Field handball players at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Pančevo
title: Ferenc Rákosi
